name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber (V)
Lore: 'Vader''s lightsaber. Symbol of the most feared man in the galaxy. Vader''s control of the dark side of the Force allows him to wield this weapon in surprising ways.',
Text: 'Deploy on Vader. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a Jedi or Skywalker for free. Draw 3 destiny and choose 2. Target hit (may place any Interrupt from opponent''s Lost Pile out of play) and forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.',
